New Records: Rohit and Rinku stitched together an unbeaten partnership of 190 runs against Afghanistan.
Rohit Sharma's 121* is the highest for the captain in the shortest format for India, but the fourth-highest individual score for India in T20Is.
The third T20I saw India posting the highest total for a team after being four down for 25 or less, reaching 212/4.
Rinku Singh and Rohit Sharma helped India score 36 runs in the final over of the match, courtesy of a no-ball.
India now have 9 whitewash series wins in T20I cricket - the most by any country in the shortest format of the sport.
Rohit now holds the record for scoring the most runs as an Indian captain in T20Is.
Rohit is now the second captain after Babar Azam to hit three T20I centuries as the captain of the team.
The third T20I for India helped Rohit equal MS Dhoni's record of winning 42 T20Is for India.
Rohit has 12 bilateral T20I series wins for India as captain.
Key Match Events: Rinku Singh and Rohit Sharma scored an unbeaten 190-run stand in the 3rd and final T20I of the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The duo of Rinku Singh and Rohit Sharma scored 36 runs in the final over, including a no-ball.
